CUSTOM.BODY: To avoid dynamic pricing based on the device identification in shops, you can adjust your device identification here. This information (UserAgent) is sent to every webserver while you are surfing the web.

ERROR.REQUIRED: Please enter a user agent string

CUSTOM.TITLE: Custom device profile

CENTER.MESSAGE_NO_NEW_EXPLAIN: There are currently no new messages available.
CENTER.TITLE: eBlocker Messages

CONFIRMATION.BODY_PART_1: This will pause the eBlocker for this device and close the ControlBar. The Dashboard will be opened in another tab.
CONFIRMATION.BODY_PART_2: You may disable the pause at anytime from the dashboard.
CONFIRMATION.TITLE: Activate pause for this device

ERROR.TOO_SHORT: PIN must have at least 4 characters.

PIN_LOCK.BODY: Do you really want to lock Internet access for this device?

PIN_SELECT_USER.BODY_LOCK: Alternatively, you can lock Internet access for this device.
PIN_SELECT_USER.BODY_PRE: The user PIN is required for the switchover to user

VERIFY.BODY: You can use one of the following services to check whether a connection can be established via Tor. Please note that eBlocker cannot guarantee the availability or correct functioning of these services.
VERIFY.TITLE: Verify connection

ACTIVATION.SUCCESS_TEXT: Staying on the same website may reveal your new IP address due to existing sessions.
ACTIVATION.TITLE: Establishing connection with VPN: {{name}}

ACTIVATION.TOOLTIP_REGISTER: Register your eBlocker to profit from all features
ACTIVATION.TOOLTIP_RENEW: Renew your license, so that you can continue to use all features.

ADS.LABEL: Ads
ADS.TOOLTIP_ALLOW_LOCAL: Ads are allowed on this page
ADS.TOOLTIP_BLOCK: {param, select, 0{No ads found on this page} 1{One ad is blocked} other{{param} ads are blocked}}
ADS.TOOLTIP_NO_FILTER: Blockers are disabled. Enable blockers to protect this device.

CLOAKING.LABEL: Cloaking
CLOAKING.TOOLTIP_ALERT_NO_HTTPS: Without HTTPS support cloaking is not 100% effective.

DASHBOARD.LABEL: Dashboard
DASHBOARD.TOOLTIP: Opens the dashboard for this device

MESSAGES.LABEL: Messages
MESSAGES.TOOLTIP: There {param, select, 1{is} other{are}} {param, select, 0{no} other{{param}}} {param, select, 1{message} other{messages}}

TRACKERS.LABEL: Trackers
TRACKERS.TOOLTIP_ALLOW_LOCAL: Trackers are allowed on this page
TRACKERS.TOOLTIP_BLOCK: {param, select, 0{No trackers found on this page} 1{One tracker is blocked} other{{param} trackers are blocked}}
TRACKERS.TOOLTIP_NO_FILTER: Filters are disabled. Enable filters to protect this device.

USER.LABEL: User
USER.TOOLTIP: This device is currently used by {param}.

ERROR.OTHER_ERROR: The action could not be completed.

DIALOG.TEXT: Your session expires in {countdown} {countdown, select, 1{second} other{seconds}}.
DIALOG.TITLE: Session expires

MESSAGE_APP_MODULE_REMOVAL_CONTENT: Support for the exception list for {{ appNames }} has been withdrawn. The exception list is still available for your convinience, however, we recommend not to use this exception list anymore.
MESSAGE_CERTIFICATE_EXPIRATION_CONTENT: The eBlocker certificate is about to expire. Please add the new certificate to your operating system or browser.
MESSAGE_CERTIFICATE_UNTRUSTED_CONTENT: The eBlocker certificate has not yet been added. Please add the certificate to your operating system or browser.
MESSAGE_DNS_LOCAL_DNS_IS_NOT_GATEWAY_CON: Another DNS (domain name server) in your local network has been found which is not your gateway or router. This will cause problems resolving DNS requests by eBlocker and disable protection. Please turn off this DNS or remove it from your DHCP configuration.
MESSAGE_DNS_UNRELIABLE_NAME_SERVERS_CONT: The following name servers are answering slowly or unreliable: {{nameServers}}. This may impair your network access.
MESSAGE_LICENSE_EXPIRED_CONTENT:
Your current eBlocker license expired on {{licenseNotValidAfter | date}}.

Please purchase a new license to keep your eBlocker activated and protected permanently.
MESSAGE_LICENSE_EXPIRING_DAY_CONTENT:
Your current eBlocker license expires on {{licenseNotValidAfter | date}}.

Please purchase a new license to keep your eBlocker activated and protected permanently.

Please note that the remaining validity period will automatically be added to your total license time.
MESSAGE_LICENSE_EXPIRING_MONTH_CONTENT:
Your current eBlocker license expires on {{licenseNotValidAfter | date}}.

Please purchase a new license to keep your eBlocker activated and protected permanently.

Please note that the remaining validity period will automatically be added to your total license time.
MESSAGE_LICENSE_EXPIRING_WEEK_CONTENT:
Your current eBlocker license expires on {{licenseNotValidAfter | date}}.

Please purchase a new license to keep your eBlocker activated and protected permanently.

Please note that the remaining validity period will automatically be added to your total license time.
MESSAGE_RELEASE_NOTES_CONTENT: New in eBlockerOS 2.5: This release is completely based on the eBlocker Open Source Code for the very first time. It does not yet contain any functional extensions, but the release is now compatible with the Raspberry Pi 4 family.
MESSAGE_ROUTER_PROBLEMATIC_CONTENT:
Your router seems to be a FritzBox 7490 (or a similar model) that is not compatible with the Plug-and-Play mode. n
Therefore we recommend to use eBlocker's individual setup to avoid these problems.
MESSAGE_SSL_SUPPORT_INSTALL_CONTENT:
Did you know, that you can use the eBlocker with HTTPS encrypted websites now?

You only need to install eBlocker's security certificate in your client device and browsers.
